item.title: Finally I Got Spacemacs+LaTeX+搜狗输入法 Working 成功了！
item.description: After weeks and weeks of toiling on the terminal, I finally finished a piece of my Linux workflow. I managed to have Chinese Characters input using 搜狗输入法 to work in Spacemacs and have the same output in LaTeX.
